name: part_008
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】あくあ色ふぇすてぃばる。【#湊あくあ4周年記念】 [O4Ip7gZQOts]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Minato Aqua and Nekomata Okayu perform a cover of the song 'Grey and Blue' (灰色と青).
MC section where Aqua and Okayu discuss their performance and their long-standing partnership as 'AkuOka'.

subtitles.original: どこからか震えたあの瞬間に
subtitles.english: At that moment when I started trembling from somewhere

subtitles.original: もう一度出会えたらいいと強く思う
subtitles.english: I strongly hope we can meet once again

subtitles.original: 忘れることはないんだ
subtitles.english: I will never forget

subtitles.original: 君は今もあの頃みたいに居るのだろうか
subtitles.english: Are you still the same as you were back then?

subtitles.original: 靴を片方茂みに落として探し回った
subtitles.english: I dropped one shoe in the bushes and searched all around for it

subtitles.original: 何があろうと僕らはきっとうまくいくと
subtitles.english: That no matter what happens, we'll surely be fine

subtitles.original: 無邪気に笑えた日々を覚えてる
subtitles.english: I remember the days when we could laugh innocently

subtitles.original: どれだけ無様に傷つくことも
subtitles.english: No matter how awkwardly we get hurt

subtitles.original: 終わらない毎日に花束を
subtitles.english: Flowers for the days that never end

subtitles.original: くだらない面影を追いかけて
subtitles.english: Chasing after worthless memories

subtitles.original: 今も歌う 今も歌う 今も歌う
subtitles.english: I'm still singing, still singing, still singing

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: 朝日が昇る前の欠けた月も
subtitles.english: Even the waning moon before the sunrise

subtitles.original: 君もどこかで見てるのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you're watching it from somewhere too

subtitles.original: 何故か今日は何でもないのに胸が痛くて
subtitles.english: For some reason, my chest hurts today even though nothing happened

subtitles.original: 滲む顔 霞む色
subtitles.english: Blurred face, hazy colors

subtitles.original: 今さら悲しいと叫ぶには
subtitles.english: To cry out that I'm sad after all this time

subtitles.original: あまりにすべてが遅すぎたかな
subtitles.english: Everything might have been just too late

subtitles.original: もう一度初めから歩けるなら
subtitles.english: If I could walk from the beginning once more

subtitles.original: すれ違うように君に会いたい
subtitles.english: I want to meet you as if we're passing each other by

subtitles.original: どれだけ背丈が変わろうとも
subtitles.english: No matter how much our heights change

subtitles.original: 変わらない何かが ありますように
subtitles.english: I hope there's something that remains unchanged

subtitles.original: くだらない面影に励まされ
subtitles.english: Encouraged by worthless memories

subtitles.original: 今も歌う 今も歌う 今も歌う
subtitles.english: I'm still singing, still singing, still singing

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: 朝日が昇る前の欠けた月も
subtitles.english: Even the waning moon before the sunrise

subtitles.original: 君もどこかで見てるのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if you're watching it from somewhere too

subtitles.original: 何もないと笑える朝日がきて
subtitles.english: The morning sun comes, laughing that there's nothing wrong

subtitles.original: 始まりは青い色
subtitles.english: The beginning is the color blue

subtitles.original: あくあ、4周年おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Aqua, congratulations on your 4th anniversary!

subtitles.original: ありがとう おかゆー！
subtitles.english: Thank you, Okayu-!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー
subtitles.english: Thank you-

subtitles.original: ということでおかゆが来てくれました！
subtitles.english: And so, Okayu has come to visit!

subtitles.original: イエーイ 今回もね、呼んでくれてありがとう
subtitles.english: Yay! Thanks for inviting me again this time.

subtitles.original: いやいやいや。おかゆさんとはね、やっぱり運命共同体ですから。
subtitles.english: No no no. After all, you and I are a "destiny-sharing couple."

subtitles.original: あ、そうだったんだ。
subtitles.english: Oh, is that so?

subtitles.original: そうですよ、呼ばないわけがないわけです。
subtitles.english: Yes, there's no way I wouldn't invite you.

subtitles.original: 運命共同体になったつもりは微塵もなかったけどね。
subtitles.english: I didn't have the slightest intention of becoming a "destiny-sharing couple" though.

subtitles.original: なんで！そんなことないでしょ！あくおかは永遠だよ！
subtitles.english: Why! That's not true! AkuOka is forever!

subtitles.original: 永遠。
subtitles.english: Forever.

subtitles.original: あくおかは永遠！
subtitles.english: AkuOka is forever!

subtitles.original: そうだったんだ。
subtitles.english: Is that so.

subtitles.original: そうだったんだってなに！他人事じゃん！
subtitles.english: What do you mean, "is that so"! You're acting like it's someone else's business!

subtitles.original: そうだったんだ。
subtitles.english: Is that so.

subtitles.original: いや、あくおかはね、むしろなんか、全然そういうのとはかけ離れてる存在だとばかり思ってたけどね。
subtitles.english: Well, I thought AkuOka was an existence that was completely far removed from that kind of thing.

subtitles.original: いやいや、私たちはSとMで繋がってるんで、磁石のように。そう。
subtitles.english: No no, we are connected by S and M, like magnets. Yes.

subtitles.original: ちょっとキモいね。
subtitles.english: That's a bit gross.

subtitles.original: なんで！なんで！なんで！
subtitles.english: Why! Why! Why!

subtitles.original: あくあがSってこと？
subtitles.english: Does that mean Aqua is the S?

subtitles.original: そうだよ、でおかゆ、え、おかゆがM。
subtitles.english: Yes, and Okayu, uh, Okayu is the M.

subtitles.original: 逆でもいいよ。
subtitles.english: Or vice versa is fine too.

subtitles.original: なんかちょっと怖い。鳥肌立ってきた。
subtitles.english: That's a bit scary. I'm getting goosebumps.

subtitles.original: なんでさ！なんでだよ！
subtitles.english: Why! Why is that!

subtitles.original: まあ、まあまあ、ちょっとこれは気持ち悪くなっちゃうからさ。
subtitles.english: Well, well, this is starting to get weird, so...

subtitles.original: 灰色と青ね、エモかったね。
subtitles.english: Grey and Blue was really emotional, wasn't it?

subtitles.original: 気持ち悪くないけどね、大切だけどね。
subtitles.english: It's not weird, it's precious though.

subtitles.original: いや良かったね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, it was good.

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃ良かったよ。
subtitles.english: It was really great.

subtitles.original: やっぱりちょっと、今年のあくおかは、2022年バージョンは、ちょっとエモ路線で行きたいんですよ。
subtitles.english: I really want this year's AkuOka, the 2022 version, to go for a more emotional style.

subtitles.original: あー、湊プロデューサー的には、あくおかはエモ。
subtitles.english: Ah, from the perspective of Producer Minato, AkuOka is emotional.

subtitles.original: はい。
subtitles.english: Yes.
